title: Inquiry-Based Science Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of science curriculum content, basic experimental design skills, and PBL experience
context.additional_context: A process where current secondary school teachers collaborate in BYOD environments to design science inquiry lessons

learning_goals: Learners can structure a framework for designing inquiry processes to solve real-world scientific problems in at least three stages.
Learners can develop collaborative inquiry activity scenarios using LAMS or similar tools and derive improvement plans with over 80% effectiveness through peer evaluation.
Learners can design formative assessment rubrics for learner-centered inquiry activities and propose strategies for integrating digital tools.

resources: LAMS or Similar Learning Design Tool Account

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
